subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Staten Island’s Marcus Browne (14-0), who will fight Cornelius White at Barclays Center on Friday, wants to earn enough money in boxing so his mother can reopen her restaurant.
snippet: Staten Island’s Marcus Browne (14-0), who will fight Cornelius White at Barclays Center on Friday, wants to earn enough money in boxing so his mother can reopen her restaurant.
